categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: Fantail-class destroyers were a class of destroyer used by the Corporate Alliance and later the naval forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. During the war, the Corporate Alliance sided with the Confederacy and used Fantail-class destroyers supported by Sikurdian privateers to defend its headquarters on the planet Murkhana.

Fantail-class destroyers were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first mentioned in the 2005 novel Labyrinth of Evil, which was written by James Luceno.
